respond to obstetric and newborn emergencies. 
Because most complications are hard to predict, 
the goal of the SMGL initiative is for all women 
in labor to be able to access EmONC services 
within 2 hours. The proportion of births 
delivered in EmONC facilities increased from 
28% at baseline to 36% at endline in Uganda and 
from 26% to 30% in Zambia (Figures 4 and 5). 
Figure 4. Percentage of Births That Took Place in Health Facilities in SMGL-Supported
